summary: Completed testing of new call statistics features: 1) Auto-logging successful calls when report submitted, 2) Quick Log Call modal with only Failed/Attempted buttons, 3) Admin delete call stats with password confirmation. All backend tests passed (13/13), UI features verified via Playwright.
seed_data_creation: Created test calls and reports during testing, cleaned up via delete operations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new call statistics features are working: 1) When consultant submits a detailed Student Calling Report, a successful call is auto-logged to call_logs collection. 2) Quick Log Call modal only shows Failed and Attempted buttons (no Success button) with note explaining successful calls are auto-logged. 3) Admin can see Delete button in Call Stats tab for each consultant, clicking opens password-protected modal to delete all call stats for that consultant.

backend_api_tests.report_submission_auto_logs_call: PASS - submitting report increases successful_calls count by 1
backend_api_tests.delete_with_correct_password: PASS - deletes all calls for consultant

consultant_dashboard.quick_log_modal_auto_log_note: PASS - visible explaining successful calls are auto-logged
consultant_dashboard.call_stats_display: PASS - shows Total, Successful, Failed, Attempted counts

admin_dashboard.call_stats_table: PASS - shows consultant stats with columns
admin_dashboard.delete_modal_opens: PASS - clicking Delete opens 'Delete Call Statistics' modal
admin_dashboard.delete_modal_warning: PASS - shows consultant ID being deleted
admin_dashboard.delete_operation: PASS - successfully deletes calls with correct password

features_verified: Consultant submitting detailed Student Calling Report auto-logs as successful call
Quick Log Call modal only has Failed and Attempted buttons (no Success button)
Admin can see Delete button in Call Stats tab for each consultant
Admin can delete call stats with password confirmation
Call stats update correctly after report submission
Call stats update correctly after admin deletes them
